definitions: The experience of love is worth the pain of its eventual end.
The emotional enrichment gained from a relationship outweighs the grief of losing it.
examples: Even though they broke up, he felt it was better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
She comforted her friend by saying it's better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
lemma: it is better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all
source: it's better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all
